Lines.Text: Alright, let's see what Lee broke this time.. I thought he'd learned something by now.
Can't get down without a handle..
Weren't you supposed to be house sitting for your grandparents?
Hey, Lee? Is that.. you?
Oh! Georgie! You're here! Okay so I'm ready to leave, I'd rather call a professional. I don't care what happens any more..
Are you okay? You sound weird. Could you open the door?
It's locked and this door won't even budge!
How did that happen?
I.. can't remember..
Lee you haven't been drinking, have you?
No! Look, my grandpa has some kind of tool box, I remember he keeps extra keys in there for some reason. There's gotta be a spare one for this door. I remember seeing it in the old office behind you.
Right, sorry for asking. Just wanted to make sure.
Don't worry about it just.. please hurry.
On it.
Locked? Strange symbols on it too.. Maybe Lee knows something?
Hey that box is locked and it's got some strange symbols on it. Does that mean anything to you?
That my grandpa is paranoid. You might have already seen those symbols in the house. They might hold a clue, I.. Please hurry, I don't.. I wanna get out of here..
Is this the basement door handle? I should see Lee.
Hey, no key but I got a door handle?
Are you there?
Basement.. the box I was talking about is probably in the basement then..
Woah you sound really off, are you okay?
Just tired.. I think.. Be careful when you go down there. I can't explain it but I felt like there were eyes glued to me at all times..
What?
I don't know, okay? I just.. donâ€™t know..
Lee seemed exhausted for some reason. I should hurry.
.. What was that?
Gotta find a way to activate this.
An exit down here? I can't open it though. Seems electrically powered.
An electric lock keeps this door shut.
What the HELL was that?! I gotta get that key fast!
Okay, this has to be it.. Oh shit..
Oh no.. Don't tell me that thing is here?
Hey come on man, we gotta get outta here!
Are you listening? We.. Lee? No sign of him or anyone at all.. I'm taking no chances, I'm leaving!
Locked?! What the hell? There has to be another exit.. The one in the basement!
This should open that door! Hope this works..
Soon out of here.. Just gotta keep going.
.. What? No exit? Dead end? Come on, there's gotta be a way out! That thing is coming, I can hear it.. Who the hell is calling me?! Lee?
Your handyman skills really came to good use, Georgie. Sadly, this is bigger than the two of us. Goodbye.
